director.name: 弗兰克·克里斯托弗 Frank Christopher

introduction: Remaking American Medicine is a four-part television series for PBS that follows pioneering individuals struggling to fix our broken health care system.Remaking American Medicine examines the healthcare "quality chasm" and questions the basic ideas viewers believe about their medical practitioners, hospitals and American medicine in general. The program focuses on the breathtaking advances being made in improving the quality of patient care and features compelling profiles of providers and patients who are working together to change the way health care is provided in the United States.
